episodes.title: Into the Ring
episodes.plot: Matt Murdock and Foggy Nelson open their law firm, and take the case of a woman accused of murder who Matt believes is innocent.

episodes.title: Cut Man
episodes.plot: Murdock makes a near fatal error while trying to save a kidnapped boy, and finds an unlikely ally when he needs saving himself.

episodes.title: Rabbit in a Snowstorm
episodes.plot: Murdock and Foggy take on a mysterious wealthy client, but Murdock is convinced that there's more to the case than just the facts.

episodes.title: In the Blood
episodes.plot: Two vicious Russian brothers working for Fisk strike back against Daredevil. Fisk moves to further consolidate his power in the criminal underworld.

episodes.title: World on Fire
episodes.plot: Fisk moves forward with plans that threaten to rip Hell's Kitchen apart. Murdock and Foggy take on a case helping tenants victimised by a slumlord.

episodes.title: Condemned
episodes.plot: Daredevil finds himself trapped in the fallout of Fisk's plan to take control of Hell's Kitchen. Ben Urich digs closer to the truth.

episodes.title: Stick
episodes.plot: An important figure from Murdock's past reemerges seeking his help to battle a new enemy threatening Hell's Kitchen.

episodes.title: Shadows in the Glass
episodes.plot: While Murdock, Foggy and Karen's mission becomes clearer, Fisk's world spins further out of control in his battle for Hell's Kitchen.

episodes.title: Speak of the Devil
episodes.plot: When Fisk gains the upper hand, the goal to destroy him becomes even more difficult, while Daredevil faces his own demons.

episodes.title: Nelson v. Murdock
episodes.plot: After Foggy and Murdock's relationship has taken a turn for the worst, a new enemy of Fisk has surfaced.

episodes.title: The Path of the Righteous
episodes.plot: Fisk and Murdock wrestle with the consequences of their chosen paths, while Ben and Karen get closer to Fisk's true past.

episodes.title: The Ones We Leave Behind
episodes.plot: Fisk seeks revenge while Karen is haunted by recent events. Daredevil makes a startling discovery about Fisk's financing.

episodes.title: Daredevil
episodes.plot: In the season finale, a boxed-in Fisk and a desperate Murdock, Foggy, and Karen are forced to play their end games.
